name: browser_terminal
description: Extension that allows you to open a native shell in the browser

scripts.start:chrome: npm run build_native && npm run manifest:install && npm run extension start:chrome; npm run manifest:uninstall
scripts.start:firefox: npm run build_native && npm run manifest:install && npm run extension start:firefox; npm run manifest:uninstall
scripts.sign: npm run build && web-ext sign -s dist
